### Search and print

```{r}
DT::datatable(Risks, extensions = 'Buttons',editable = TRUE, rownames = FALSE, options = list(
    dom = 'Bfrtip',
    colReorder = TRUE,
    keys = TRUE,
    rowReorder = TRUE,
    buttons = c('copy', 'csv', 'excel', 'pdf', 'print')
  )
)
```
